forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms during the morning becoming more widespread this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
